title: (x) Singleton Ogilvy & Mather - Ogilvy Baskerville (custom face) {HBM}
content:
Any hints? I know parts are custom built especially the g, but what's the rest?   
   
 [www.singogilvy.com.au/advertising.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141324/http:/www.singogilvy.com.au/advertising.asp) ![Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141324im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41882.gif)
author: iamsam

comments.content:
The best man for your question is Mr. H. Spears - formerly Director of Typography for O&M for 15 years ï¿½   
   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141324im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
The Lord of The Ring

Or...   
   
 the answer: Ogilvy Baskerville (slightly bolder and has a higher x-height than Baskerville. It was specially commissioned!! So you can't buy it.   
   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141324im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
   
The Lord of The Ring
HBM are you Mike Tyson? Former Lord of the Ring
